articles.title: Tokyo Olympics 2020: India beat Spain 3-0 in men's hockey - Times of India
articles.description: Tokyo Olympics News: The Indian men's hockey team defeated Spain 3-0 to register its second win at the Tokyo Olympics on Tuesday.

articles.title: Tokyo Olympics: Manu Bhaker-Saurabh Chaudhary disappoint, fail to qualify for medal matches in 10m Air Pistol Team event - India Today
articles.description: Saurabh Chaudhary and Manu Bhaker failed to qualify for the medal rounds in 10m Air Pistol Mixed Team event after topping the Qualification Stage 1 in Tokyo on Tuesday. Abhishek Verma and Yashaswini Deswal’s campaign ended early.
